translations: 伪善；假装虔诚；道貌岸然

sentences.sentence: I know nothing, indeed, which so disfigures the countenance of a young person, or so impresses every feature with an air of demureness, if not altogether of sanctimoniousness and of age.
sentences.translation: 我，说真的，不知道有什么会把一个年轻人的面孔伪装成这样，给面孔的每一部分都加上如此明显的做作神情，如果说不是加上满脸的伪善和世故的话。
